name: NextNight
description:
This is a third person tower defense game, players need to kill zombies as much as possible by using the defense device and the rifle in hand after killing zombies to get through the night. There will be a lot of zombies in the night, killing zombies will have a certain chance to get a reward, after successful night can choose the reward you want. After each night, the zombie will become a little more powerful, reasonable choice will help you, wish you a successful night!

Light

You can place up to 5 lights to illuminate the night

Rewards and placements

You can earn rewards by shooting zombies, and these bonus equipment can be placed to help you increase your means of damage.

Survival rewards

After dawn you can choose a reward.
